participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Friendly and outgoing, enjoys meeting new people.
participant_1.background: I've blonde hair and blue eyes. I do not like chicken. I work at a bar at night to pay for college. I recently got an apartment with my best friend.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Creative and introspective, with a passion for languages and music.
participant_2.background: One of the languages that I'm currently studying is Spanish. I am a musician. My favorite Spanish word is trabajo. I also study languages. My next language to study is French.
